pullRequest.title: Move from Docker Hub to Quay.io
pullRequest.bodyText:
Type of change

Task

Description
This PR implements the move from Docker Hub to Quay.io to avoid the pull limits. This was proposed in https://github.com/strimzi/proposals/blob/master/014-move-docker-images-to-quay.io.md
This PR changes the build and release tooling as well as the configurations of the Azure and Jenkins pipelines.
Checklist

 Update documentation
 Update CHANGELOG.md

commit.message:
Move from Docker Hub to Quay.io

Signed-off-by: Jakub Scholz <www@scholzj.com>

Signed-off-by: Jakub Scholz <www@scholzj.com>

Fix Bridge version target in Makefile

Signed-off-by: Jakub Scholz <www@scholzj.com>

Signed-off-by: Jakub Scholz <www@scholzj.com>

 | `image.tag`                          | Cluster Operator image tag                | `latest`                                             |
